About Us

Affins Inventory management system

Affins was Inaugurated on 25th December 2021. Affins focuses on providing the customers with an all-in-one inventory management system so that the life of the retailers can become much more easier and they can concentrate more on how to expand their businees rather than worrying about maintaing a list of items in the inventory or keeping track of quantity of each stocks or storing all the information about the wholesalers, etc. Considering the national roll out, Affins has been developed with modular and scalable approach with configurable rule based architecture allowing customization to easily incorporate specific requirements from nationwide stakeholders.
